events.message: We have received the application from Dr. Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review her impressive background in full-stack development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster, focusing specifically on software engineering roles aligned with the candidate's experience and skills.
Recruiter Mark Thompson has been assigned to manage Dr. Jane Doe's recruitment process and will be the primary contact moving forward.
Initial phone screening with Dr. Jane Doe went well, confirming her experience with Python, React, and AWS, and her enthusiasm for the role.
Dr. Jane Doe responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC, involving coding challenges and system design questions to assess technical abilities.
